publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman says:

sense.def: the person of elevated social status 與野人相對

tls:text.tls:line: The gentleman says:

sense.def: say: S

tls:text.tls:line: "In studying one must not stop."

sense.def: the attempt to learn about things (typically from a teacher) study; the pursuit of intellectual/moral self-development; learning

tls:text.tls:line: "In studying one must not stop."

sense.def: not

tls:text.tls:line: "In studying one must not stop."

sense.def: desist, give it a break; stop at a certain point, leave it at that, leave things as they are and do nothing about them

tls:text.tls:line: As for blue, one takes it from the indigo plant,

sense.def: 取諸其懷to take (a certain amount or part N1) (from a whole or a place N2), to pick out (something N1) (from a larger group N2)

tls:text.tls:line: As for blue, one takes it from the indigo plant,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: but it is bluer than the indigo plant.

sense.def: but, and yet

tls:text.tls:line: but it is bluer than the indigo plant.

sense.def: indigo plant

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: ice; layer of ice; iced water

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: water

tls:text.tls:line: As for ice, water produces/constitutes it,

sense.def: anaphoric, referring to an aforementioned person: him, her, it; you

tls:text.tls:line: but it is colder than water.

sense.def: but, and yet

tls:text.tls:line: but it is colder than water.

sense.def: be colder than N

tls:text.tls:line: but it is colder than water.

sense.def: water

tls:text.tls:line: A piece of wood may be straight to fit the plumbline,

sense.def: piece of timber, piece of wood

tls:text.tls:line: A piece of wood may be straight to fit the plumbline,

sense.def: be straight and unwarped, not bent, not crooked

tls:text.tls:line: so that its roundness fits the compass.

sense.def: be bent or curved

tls:text.tls:line: If one imitates the practice of the right person

sense.def: imitate

tls:text.tls:line: If one imitates the practice of the right person

sense.def: the right person (for a typically important task or purpose)

tls:text.tls:line: If one imitates the practice of the right person

sense.def: current practice

tls:text.tls:line: and the explanations of the gentleman

sense.def: a person of superior character; the person of superior character 得見君子者斯可矣。

tls:text.tls:line: and the explanations of the gentleman

sense.def: detailed explanation; satisfactory explanation; doctrine, thesis; discourse

tls:text.tls:line: then one will become honoured and as a result widely known,

sense.def: be appreciated; be highly esteemed; be highly valued

tls:text.tls:line: then one will become honoured and as a result widely known,

sense.def: ＝遍 become famous everywhere

tls:text.tls:line: and then one will be ever-present in one's generation.

sense.def: one's own generation

tls:text.tls:line: and then one will be ever-present in one's generation.

sense.def: permeate throughout 周於

tls:text.tls:line: one should not tell him;

sense.def: pass on the determinate information to the determinate audience

tls:text.tls:line: if someone informs on indecorous matters,

sense.def: what is indecorous; what is uncouth; what is evil

tls:text.tls:line: one should not ask questions of him;

sense.def: ask the contextually determinate person N1 questions concerning the topic N2

tls:text.tls:line: only then should one receive him,

sense.def: receive somebody

tls:text.tls:line: To get it wrong one time,

sense.def: one time; for the first time; once (a day)

tls:text.tls:line: To get it wrong one time,

sense.def: at one time... at another time

tls:text.tls:line: and to get it right the next time,

sense.def: at one time... at another time

tls:text.tls:line: that is the way of the man in the street.

sense.def: ordinary street

tls:text.tls:line: Those who are good are few,

sense.def: be in the minority (perhaps vt( prep N "be fewer than the contextually determinate N)

tls:text.tls:line: those who are not good are in the majority:

sense.def: be in the majority (as compared to the contextually determinate N)

tls:text.tls:line: those who are not good are in the majority:

sense.def: the bad, the wicked

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: control (perhaps prototypically water and rivers; breath, emotions, or the mind), order properly, deal with efficiently

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: inner mental energies of a person; vital energies in a person

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: cultivate (a mentality, connections etc)

tls:text.tls:line: In summary, of all the methods of controlling the vital energies and nourishing the mind,

sense.def: proper technique, proper method

tls:text.tls:line: how could he achieve that?

sense.def: achieve the contextually determiante N

tls:text.tls:line: (That standard) is suitable for timely success/

sense.def: be appropriate for

tls:text.tls:line: is of use for living under hard conditions./

sense.def: be located in (a place); find oneself in (a condition, at a time); occupy (a position or an office); place oneself (in a position or place)

tls:text.tls:line: is of use for living under hard conditions./

sense.def: SHI: state of destitution

tls:text.tls:line: is of use for living under hard conditions./

sense.def: be advantageous; be profitable, be advisable

tls:text.tls:line: That (standard) is ritual propriety and good faith.

sense.def: ritual propriety, the rules and principles of ritual propriety; the demands of ritual

tls:text.tls:line: That (standard) is ritual propriety and good faith.

sense.def: credibility; trustworthiness, good faith, dependability, reliability

tls:text.tls:line: and to accord with others on good points is called obedience;

sense.def: conform, align oneself with

tls:text.tls:line: and to accord with others on good points is called obedience;

sense.def: goodness of attitude; moral goodness

tls:text.tls:line: and to accord with others on good points is called obedience;

sense.def: be in harmony with; comply nicely with; stay in harmony with;

tls:text.tls:line: to guide others with bad points is called (active) ingratiating flattery,

sense.def: wickedness, bad actions; an action that is not good

tls:text.tls:line: to guide others with bad points is called (active) ingratiating flattery,

sense.def: lead; German: mit gutem Beispiel vorangehen

tls:text.tls:line: to guide others with bad points is called (active) ingratiating flattery,

sense.def: sycophancy through words or action

tls:text.tls:line: and none more intelligent than unifying one's likes.

sense.def: be supernatural, divine, numinous; divinely efficient; be possessed of supernatural powers; occasionally used in a derived transitive sense

tls:text.tls:line: and none more intelligent than unifying one's likes.

sense.def: likes, preferences

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: orientations and thoughts

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: be refined and beautiful 甚修

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: be arrogant towards> proudly look down upon

tls:text.tls:line: If a person cultivates his will and sense of purpose, he can take more pride in them than in riches and eminence.

sense.def: wealth and nobility

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: serious; endowed with social weight; act with conviction; have the courage of one's convictions

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: moral orientation

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: make light of; think little of; be not afraid of; to slight, hold in disrespect, to fail to show the proper respect for (the law etc)

tls:text.tls:line: If he gives due weight to the Way and what is congruent with it, he will have slight regard fo kings and dukes.

sense.def: kingship and dukedom

tls:text.tls:line: Absorbed in the examination of his inner self, he will scorn mere external things.

sense.def: external things
